DOC.criteria: Male 21 70 year old Erectile Function domain score 1019 International Index Erectile Function ( IIEF ) In stable , monogamous relationship consent female partner willing attempt vaginal sexual intercourse least one occasion per week average study period History ED ( clinically define inability attain maintain erection penis sufficient permit satisfactory sexual intercourse ) least 3 month duration Treated previously PDE5 inhibitor satisfactory response , define patient . Signed informed consent The presence follow excludes subject study enrollment : ED cause untreated endocrine disease , i.e. , hypopituitarism , hypothyroidism , hypogonadism A diagnosis situational psychogenic ED Significant penile pathology , include limited curvature , fibrosis , sexually transmitted disease , penile implant Clinically significant hepatic , renal , neurological disease , diabetes mellitus , spinal cord injury , significant coronary heart disease , significant neurological disease hepatitis B and/or C History prostate cancer prostate surgery transurethral resection prostate History alcoholism within previous 2 year Current consumer three unit alcohol per day ( 1 unit equivalent 1 glass wine , 1 pint beer , 1 shot hard liquor ) Taking ED therapy ( prescription medication , overthecounter medication , herbal preparation medical device ) screen visit Participation another study investigational drug device 30 day prior study entry Has condition interfere ability provide inform consent comply study instruction
